metadata.title: Champion Ipo Circular
description: Keep it cozy, casual in the Champion® Ipo Circular slide featuring a classic slip-on slide sandal boasting branding logos on straps. Available in multiple color options.
Keep it cozy, casual in the Champion® Ipo Circular slide featuring a classic slip-on slide sandal boasting branding logos on straps. Available in multiple color options.
